Keep your connection with Allah (سُبْحَانَهُ وَتَعَالَىٰ) alive while working on your computer. In our busy lives, we often struggle to find time for Quran recitation. This extension bridges that gap, bringing the Holy Quran into your daily digital routine.

Imagine completing the entire Holy Quran while doing your regular work! With hourly reminders and carefully timed verses, you'll progress through all 6,236 verses naturally. For a typical desk job (7 hours/day), you can complete the Quran in about 2.5 years - imagine the blessings of such consistent dedication!
